text: The 1897 Colgate football team represented Colgate University in the 1897 college football season. The team captain for the 1897 season was Walter Cramp.http://gocolgateraiders.com.s3.amazonaws.com/documents/2012/11/28/Year- by-Year_Results.pdf?id=2765 ==Schedule== 1897 Colgate Game-by-Game Records, College Football Data Warehouse, retrieved January 7, 2017. ==References== Colgate Category:Colgate Raiders football seasons Colgate football
title: 1897 Colgate football team
